original: Brunstad has several fast food restaurants, a cafeteria-style restaurant, coffee bar, and its own grocery store.
simplified: Brunstad has several fast food restaurants. || It also has a grocery store and a coffee bar.

original: A fee is the price one pays as remuneration for services, especially the honorarium paid to a doctor, lawyer, consultant, or other member of a learned profession.
simplified: A fee is the price one pays for services. || A good example of a fee is the money a doctor, lawyer, consultant, or other member of a profession pays.

original: Defiantly, she vowed to never renounce the Commune, and dared the judges to sentence her to death.
simplified: She said that she would never leave the commune. || She dared the judges to sentence her to death.

original: Plot Captain Caleb Holt (Kirk Cameron) is a firefighter in Albany, Georgia and firmly keeps the cardinal rule of all firemen, "Never leave your partner behind".
simplified: The story Captain Caleb Holt (Kirk Cameron) is a fireman in Albany, Georgia. || He is very strict about never leaving his partner behind.

original: Bremer reported plans to put Saddam on trial, but claimed that the details of such a trial had not yet been determined.
simplified: Bremer said there were plans to put Saddam on trial. || However, he said the details were still being worked out.

original: Finally in 1482 the Order dispatched him to Florence, the â€˜ city of his destiny â€™.
simplified: In 1482 the Order sent him to Florence, the city where he was meant to be.

original: The Prime Minister stays in office only as long as he or she retains the support of the lower house.
simplified: The Prime Minister stays in office only as long as the lower house of Parliament supports him.

original: During childhood she suffered from collapsed lungs twice, she had pneumonia 4-5 times a year, a ruptured appendix, and had a tonsillar cyst.
simplified: During her childhood she had twice had collapsed lungs, 4-5 times a year had pneumonia, had a ruptured appendix, and had a tonsillar cyst.

original: From 1900 to 1920 many new facilities were constructed on campus, including facilities for the dental and pharmacy programs, a chemistry building, a building for the natural sciences, Hill Auditorium, large hospital and library complexes, and two residence halls.
simplified: From 1900 to 1920 many new buildings were built on campus. || They were for the dental and pharmacy programs, a chemistry building, a building for the natural sciences, a large hospital, a library, and two residence halls.

original: Prospectors from California, Europe and China were also digging along the Peel River and up the mountain slopes.
simplified: People from Europe and China were also digging for gold along the Peel River and up the mountains.

original: In 1438 Trevi passed under the temporal rule of the Church as part of the legation of Perugia, and thenceforth its history merges first with that of the States of the Church, then (1860) with the united Kingdom of Italy.
simplified: In 1438 Trevi came under the temporal rule of the Church as part of the legation of Perugia. || From then on its history goes together with the States of the Church and, in 1860, with the Kingdom of Italy.

original: Prior to the arrival of the storm, the National Park Service closed visitor centers and campgrounds along the Outer Banks.
simplified: Before the storm reached the coast, the National Park Service closed many places for visitors on the Outer Banks.

original: After the Sena dynasty, Dhaka was successively ruled by the Turkish and Afghan governors descending from the Delhi Sultanate before the arrival of the Mughals in 1608.
simplified: After the Sena dynasty, the city was ruled by Turkish and Afghan governors. || The Delhi Sultanate ruled the city until the Mughals came in 1608.

original: Her notorious friendship with the Russian mystic Grigori Rasputin was also an important factor in her life.
simplified: Her friendship with the Russian mystic Grigori Rasputin was also an important part of her life.
